verses.text: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* venerable \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3605"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sounding \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H8643"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* holocaust \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w calf|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H6241"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* every calf, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H8081"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, which \w in|strong="H3532"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* are \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

\w And|strong="H5795"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, which \w is|strong="H0259"\w* offered \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* expiation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people,

\w Besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* holocaust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* first \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* accustomed libations. \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* same ceremonies you \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H2088"\w* venerable unto \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holocaust \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* most sweet odour, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w calf|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* calf, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,

The \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, which are \w in|strong="H3532"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w things|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H4503"\w* are wont \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w be|strong="H0259"\w* offered \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w for|strong="H0259"\w* expiation, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust \w with|strong="H0905"\w* their \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* libations.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fifteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* venerable, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w celebrate|strong="H2287"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* solemnity \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holocaust \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* libations \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* calf, being \w in|strong="H4503"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w thirteen|strong="H6240"\w* calves: \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, being \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H6240"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, being \w in|strong="H3532"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* libations \w for|strong="H4941"\w* every \w one|strong="H3532"\w*, \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* calves \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* you shall duly celebrate:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w eleven|strong="H6240"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* libations \w of|strong="H4557"\w* every \w one|strong="H3532"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* calves \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* you shall offer \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* rite:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w*, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer tell \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* libations \w of|strong="H4557"\w* every \w one|strong="H3532"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* calves \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* you shall celebrate \w in|strong="H4503"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4503"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* libation thereof.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, which \w is|strong="H3117"\w* moat \w solemn|strong="H6116"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w*:
